short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhancing your learning from YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever find yourself passively watching educational YouTube videos without truly grasping the material? 

Introducing re:mind - a Chrome extension powered by artificial intelligence that challenges your understanding of the content through personalized questions for the video you're watching.

Here's how it works: as you watch a YouTube lecture, re:mind intelligently analyzes the audio and visual cues to identify key concepts and essential information. It then generates a series of insightful questions designed to test your comprehension and retention. These questions appear conveniently alongside the video, allowing you to seamlessly integrate active learning into your study routine.
